name: Swing Dragon 3D
description:
Evil aliens with their vehicles and robots are evading our pretty Earth now.
The planet is on the verge of death or destruction. Come on Hero! Please control the giant iron dragon to fight back evaders!

Hold to make dragon drill down and release to make it fly up.
When you do this, you can also collect coins and suddenly attack enemies by crashing abandoned buildings. These are important targets!
Attention to limited time of drilling down. Drilling under ground for long time will make dragon injured.
And pay attention to the paved laser net and bullets on ground!

Besides of exciting battle with BOSS, don’t forget to enjoy the thrilling of destruction!
